r1.description: Name of the first robot involved in the collision

r2.description: Name of the second robot involved in the collision

automaticMonitor.description: If true automatically display collision monitors as constraints get activated. Otherwise those monitors are managed manually

useCommon.description: If true and r1Index == r2Index, add the common self-collisions set

useMinimal.description: If true and r1Index == r2Index, add the minimal self-collisions set

collisions.description: List of collisions in the constraint
